typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as short,
		HIREDATE as date,
		SAL as short,
		COMM as short,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> emp
source(output(
		DEPTNO as short,
		DNAME as string,
		LOC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dept
emp, dept join(emp@DEPTNO == dept@DEPTNO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpDept
JoinEmpDept sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empdeptout'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> finaloutput
